website_summaries.verdict: Personal fan with solar power, so it is useful for any type of outdoor activity in summer.
pros: Runs quietly, so it won't interrupt your activity
Solar panel charges 2000 mAh interior battery so efficiently that you can charge mobile devices from the fan
Lightweight unit at 2.2 pounds, so you can take it anywhere
cons: Kind of pricey for a personal fan
Size is only made for one person

customer_reviews.title: A bit flimsy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fan worked nicely but didn’t last too long. Its a bit flimsy for the price. I got it for my mom when hurricane Maria struck PR and it worked well after charged but it only lasted 4 months then stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Hilda

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: After two weeks of using my Multi-Function Solar Fan daily, I am very happy with it: it is simple to use, holds a good charge, the LED lights are good and bright, and the fan cools me down nicely at night. I haven’t used the built in MP3 yet but have been listening to music from my own MP3 through it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin V.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The fans were great, the people in need in Puerto Rico loved them!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this little fan. It's working perfect for my needs. This is an awesome light/fan combo to take camping! We were all amazed at this little fan. So lightweight, but has a strong enough fan speed to make it worthwhile. I’m giving it 5 stars because it’s exactly as the description says. One of the best purchases I've made! Would definitely buy again or recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: CATHERINE

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this fan for camping as my husband likes to sleep with a fan on. I really like the size it is small but just the right size for a camping tent. It's quiet and small, but puts out some good airflow. The light is perfect for a night light. I love the portability of the fan. Super convenient, lightweight, and functional - battery life is alright. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Solar fan
customer_reviews.text: We love the solar fan. We have a cabin that occasionally loses power in the summer and to have something that can cool us down a bit was a must have. This is a great addition to other backup power products we have up there. It's small and light enough that I take it with me when we go camping as well. The flashlight is great but we really like the ring of LEDs. Put that up on the camping table and family dinners are no longer a battle of headlamps and the fan can deter bugs that might be interested in your food. We will see how it performs over time but we are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sun100

customer_reviews.title: Fan not as strong as I would have liked
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for being outdoors in the summer. I was disappointed that the fan isn't as strong as I'd hoped, and it's fairly noisy. I haven't figured out how to get the radio to work since there's no tuner. I haven't tried an MP3 yet. The lights work fine. The instructions were obviously written by someone whose native language is not English, but one can get the gist. I did have to figure out on my own that to operate any part of this, you have to push the power button that's down by the radio; wasn't obvious that it applied to the whole device.
customer_reviews.author: KRISTIN W MOORE

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: This completely stopped working after 4 uses. It won't work at all now. It won't take a charge by sun or electric hookup. Expensive waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lady of the Lake

customer_reviews.title: super efficient, I already have the product, thank you very much
customer_reviews.text: super efficient, I already have the product, thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: MIGDALIA PEREZ DE JESUS

customer_reviews.title: Good solar fan
customer_reviews.text: The solar fan worked well, was quiet and effective. We charged it also with a generator, so can't comment on how well the solar charging worked. But it ran a long time and kept us cool. Haven't tried the radio.
customer_reviews.author: M. Steenburgh

customer_reviews.title: Fan
customer_reviews.text: This was an great disappointment. Small,flimsy,and fan did not even cut on. Then I had to pay to return this junk. Dont buy this product. Packing was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bruce

customer_reviews.title: If it looks too good to be true it probably isn’t any good!!😢😖
customer_reviews.text: There is no radio apparatus!! The solar power doesn’t last very long nor does a charge session last long!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Kearns

customer_reviews.title: Open the back of it in order to feel any wind.
customer_reviews.text: I like the solar charge capabilities, the lights are very nice. I wish it put out more wind with the fan. But it's great for putting it in the back of the vehicles in front of dog kennels.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney H.

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I have a tiny greenhouse that needed a small, solar powered fan to help keep air moving. This fan fits that description PERFECTLY! All the other features like the lights are huge bonuses. This fan runs, even when it's charging. It can last all day (on a sunny day), and it never gets extremely hot. I am VERY happy with this purchase, and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

product_meta.title: DHD Multi-Function Solar Fan Electric Outdoor Fishing Fan with Radio/MP3/Table Lamp/Torch/Cell Phone Charging Function for Camping Fishing and Hurricane Emergency (Yellow)
product_meta.description:
Color:YellowSpecifications:
(1) PV Panel power rating- 2 Wp. 
(2) Lithium Battery capacity- 2000M AH×2pcs. 
(3) Fan motor power rating- 2 W. 
(4) USB port output voltage- 5 VDC. 
(5) Digital Audio Player & FM Radio power rating- 3 W. 
(6) Output frequency- 150 to 18000 Hz (±3 db).
(7) Receiving frequency coverage- 88 to 108 MHz. 
(8) LED Desk Lamp power rating- 1.6 W. 
(9) LED Spotlight power rating- 0.5 W. 
(10) AC-DC Adapter- input V: 100 – 240 VAC; output : 8.4 VDC, charging current 1 A max. 
(11) Weight- net: 1 Kg;
(12) Measurements- net: 275x186x80 mm;

Functionalities: 
(1) Clean, sustainable solar energy- provides photovoltaic power by putting the device under the sun for a long time
(2) AC-DC Adapter with full spectrum input V- provides emergency re-charging power battery. 
(3) Circular LED Desk Lamp- with 26 LED’s providing efficient lighting for general purpose illumination needs
(4) LED Spotlight- provides a high intensity light beam with minimal diffusion 
(5) 5-Blade DC Fan- uniquely designed for robust & silent performance; Airflow can be regulated by configuring the PV panel anchoring frame
(6) Output 5V USB port- provides power for, as well as the re-charging of: cell phones & other digital audio. 
(7) Input USB & TF Card ports- provides interfaces for downloading, voluminous storage & playing of digital audio devices. 
(8) FM Radio- optimized for high sensitivity, electronic auto-tuning & receiving
(9) Input USB & TF Card ports- enable the downloading of music & other data directly from computers & other external storage devices
(10) Earphone jack – enable listening to music and radio
feature_bullets: 5-Blade DC Portable Fan- uniquely designed for robust & silent performance; capable of 7 hours of continuous operation before battery re-charging
Clean, sustainable solar energy- provides photovoltaic power to re-charge the internal lithium battery
LED Desk Lamp- with 26 LED’s providing efficient lighting for general purpose illumination needs for about 9 hours
Power Supply Output 5V- provides power for, as well as the re-charging of: cell phones & other digital audio
FM Radio and Input USB & TF Card ports– enable listening to music and radio for 6-8 hours
